creator: GHT Mobility GmbH
descriptionHtml:
CleverShuttle is Germany's most popular on-demand ridesharing app and the perfect taxi or carsharing alternative. Simply book your shuttle ride via the app. We will pick you up in a few minutes and drive you to your destination. Just like in a classic carpool, you might share the vehicle with nice people on a similar route. Like this our trips are up to 50% cheaper than by cab and thanks to our electric and hydrogen cars we reduce the amount of pollution in our cities.

CleverShuttle is currently available in Berlin, Munich, Leipzig, Dresden, Düsseldorf and Kiel. You can find more information on our business areas on our homepage.

Here's how it works:

1) Download the free app
After the short registration you can start right away.

2) Enter start and destination
Enter your address, use the map or let yourself be located.

3) Confirm the suggested trip
You will be informed of the price and time of arrival in advance.

4) Get picked up by our driver
You can track the arrival of your shuttle in real-time

5) Pay easily
You can easily pay by credit card, PayPal, credit or in cash.


Do you have any questions about your booking, our service or just want to leave us some feedback? Then write us an email to: support@clevershuttle.de



***
CleverShuttle is Germany's leading ride pooling service. We offer you a cheap and green alternative to other mobility services, ridesharing apps or car sharing apps. CleverShuttle is more convenient than car sharing, scooter sharing or local public transport, as our professional drivers will pick you up and take you safely and comfortably to your individual destination. Thanks to our ride pooling algorithm, i.e. the bundling of trips, aswell as an environmentally friendly fleet of electric vehicles and hydrogen vehicles CleverShuttle is greener and cheaper than any taxi.

descriptionShort: Book affordable and eco-friendly door-to-door-mobility on demand.
title: CleverShuttle: Ridesharing Service

creator: GHT Mobility GmbH
descriptionHtml:
CleverShuttle is Germany's most popular on-demand ridesharing app and the perfect taxi or carsharing alternative. Simply book your shuttle ride via the app. We will pick you up in a few minutes and drive you to your destination. Just like in a classic carpool, you might share the vehicle with nice people on a similar route. Like this our trips are up to 50% cheaper than by cab and thanks to our electric and hydrogen cars we reduce the amount of pollution in our cities.

CleverShuttle is currently available in Leipzig, Düsseldorf and Kiel. You can find more information on our business areas on our homepage.

Here's how it works:

1) Download the free app
After the short registration you can start right away.

2) Enter start and destination
Enter your address, use the map or let yourself be located.

3) Confirm the suggested trip
You will be informed of the price and time of arrival in advance.

4) Get picked up by our driver
You can track the arrival of your shuttle in real-time

5) Pay easily
You can easily pay by credit card, PayPal, credit or in cash.


Do you have any questions about your booking, our service or just want to leave us some feedback? Then write us an email to: support@clevershuttle.de



***
CleverShuttle is Germany's leading ride pooling service. We offer you a cheap and green alternative to other mobility services, ridesharing apps or car sharing apps. CleverShuttle is more convenient than car sharing, scooter sharing or local public transport, as our professional drivers will pick you up and take you safely and comfortably to your individual destination. Thanks to our ride pooling algorithm, i.e. the bundling of trips, aswell as an environmentally friendly fleet of electric vehicles and hydrogen vehicles CleverShuttle is greener and cheaper than any taxi.
